thread.section_title: Auto Lenders Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Auto Lenders | autolenders.com
thread.title: Lynsey Adams
thread.title_full: Auto Lenders reviewed by Lynsey Adams

author: Lynsey Adams
title: Lynsey Adams
text: While looking for a vehicle we were interested in, we noticed online, that your Lakewood location had a 2016 GMC Denali in stock. I called and spoke with a man on the phone who was polite, very organized and to the point. He stated the vehicle would be ready for us upon our arrival. And once we arrived, everything was ready. Joel took care of us and mediated a deal that worked perfectly for us. We left very happy and would recommend Joel and your company.
